content: The Fungiwoman behaves almost identically to the Fungiman you fight fought in the Pagoda Realm (and a few times after), only they'll have a bit more health, and deal a bit more damage, but you should know what to expect for most of their attacks. Though they have a boss healthbar, they aren't tracked in your journal for Yaoguai Chief entries.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Fungiwoman'.
The content is as follows:
The Fungiwoman behaves almost identically to the Fungiman you fight fought in the Pagoda Realm (and a few times after), only they'll have a bit more health, and deal a bit more damage, but you should know what to expect for most of their attacks. Though they have a boss healthbar, they aren't tracked in your journal for Yaoguai Chief entries.
